```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Load the required libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(viridis)
library(GGally)

# Read the dataset
data <- read.csv("onderwijsuitgaven_2020.csv")

# Create a pie chart
pie_chart <- ggplot(data, aes(x = reorder(Onderwijssectoren, Totaal, decrease=TRUE  ), y = Totaal, fill = Totaal)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 1) +
  coord_polar("y", start = 0) +
  labs(title = "Distribution of Onderwijsuitgaven 2020", fill = "Totaal in million") +
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(axis.title.y = element_blank()) +
  scale_fill_viridis()

# Display the pie chart
print(pie_chart)

# Create a pie chart
pie_chart <- ggplot(data, aes(x = "", y = Totaal, fill = Totaal)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 1) +
  coord_polar("y", start = 0) +
  labs(title = "Distribution of Onderwijsuitgaven 2020", fill = "Totaal in million") +
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(axis.title.y = element_blank()) +
   scale_fill_viridis() +  theme(axis.text = element_blank(), legend.position = "none")
   
   
# Display the pie chart
print(pie_chart)
```
